name: Here Nya
description:
The best indie game in the world with easy control, to come and play, you can meet a sea of ​​mistakes and it will be cool.
You are given four locations for pleasure: Dense forest, Sandy wastelands, Fire expanses and Winter expanses. Although they seem monotonous, but include your imagination and it will be cool.

In this game you control the paladin and kill the monsters and demons with the power of light, you will have on your way not only monsters, but also obstacles that you must overcome and get to the portal to another world.
After going through all the levels you will encounter a terrible monster that no one could defeat. Try to do it yourself and win the respect of many people, but no, only mine.
